Class PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    PreferenceHeaderAdapter

    public static class PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder
extends Object
    The view holder, which is used by the adapter.

        Returns the text view, which is used to show the preference header's title.

        public final TextView getSummaryTextView()
        Returns the text view, which is used to show the preference header's summary.

        The text view, which is used to show the preference header's summary, as an instance of the class TextView or null, if the text view is not available

      • getIconImageView

        public final ImageView getIconImageView()
        Returns the image view, which is used to show the preference header's icon.
        Returns:
        The image view, which is used to show the preference header's icon, as an instance of the class ImageView or null, if the image view is not available
